is already a father 😂

an orphan or an unplanned pregnancy and boom. babygast.

not to mention that THE MOMENT Caleb had even a little bit of stability in his life he dove right into adopting a bunch of kids. i can't read him teaching a gaggle of academy rejects in his backyard any other way. as far as i'm concerned Caleb

i agree! tbh i can see both scenarios (planning a child and accidentally stumbling into being dads) as plausible, but i feel like for how much they would probably want to be meticulous planners about it (if they do decide to have a kid), they're also both chaotic idiots in their own right. there's
folks were talking about shadowgast babies and i didn’t know i wanted caleb as a dad but i did. i sure did.

need to bury so soon, but that guy has surprised me before with how quickly he can change and how enthusiastically he took to the idea of taking care of something. and i think he would throw his entire genius brain to this whole raising a child business if he needed to 🤭

Essek is a very solitary and not particularly fatherly character, and with how he reacted/what he said after Lucien/Molly's death (on having worked his entire life to prevent things like that) i also don't think he sounds like someone that would consider himself ready to have a child he would

do i actually think caleb and essek have kids in canon? nah. do i think that caleb has been father-coded the entire campaign and essek embarked on his 'learning to nurture' arc at the end of c2? absolutely. universes where they end up being dads make perfect sense to me

i've been losing my mind over that second image for like two hours
the expressions are just so spot on, HOW. and it's just circles and a few lines. like i've seen Caleb make that face before

also the first picture... i'm not even like a big huge fan of baby aus but this is melting me. SO cute

so beautiful!! god i love looking at all the little details you put in your illustrations, seeing the hot plate unlocked some memories for me that i didn't even know i had (i used to have a similar one when i was at college) 🥺 thank you for this!!
